keywords.DESCRIPTION: If this card is in your hand, each card played increases its cost #yTemporarily by #b1 . Temporary cost modifies will last till the end of turn.
The cost of this card cannot be changed in any way.
If this card is in your hand, each time you play a card costs no more than this card, reduce its cost #yTemporarily by #b1 . Temporary cost modifies will last till the end of turn.
When this card is played, play it twice.
#rBleeding creatures lose HP and gain #b1 additional #rBleeding when taking unblocked #yAttack damage. At the start of their turn, they lose HP and half the #rBleeding stack.
Temporary cost modifies will last till the end of turn.
